MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Maes Meddyg and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:11 PM. Our emergency response team is on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09PM on 19th March 2021.
